video_prompt: A little girl wearing a yellow hat and a white dress with colorful polka dots is standing in a field of purple flowers. She is looking at the camera and smiling. The background shows a scenic view of a town with buildings and greenery in the distance. The ambient sound is the sound of wind blowing through the flowers.
audio_prompt: The sound of wind blowing through the flowers

speech_prompt.speaker: the girl
speech_prompt.text: Mom, come here quickly. The flowers here are so beautiful.
